channel.title: Sports

item.description: Here is the best of the best from NFL Week 16 across offense, defense and special teams.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Patriots' Win Over the Ravens
item.description: The Patriots clinched a playoff berth while the Ravens fell into a potentially insurmountable hole. Here's what we learned about both teams.
